experiences.place: MCTI (Ministério da Ciência, Tecnologia e Inovações)
LAMFO (Laboratório de Aprendizado de Máquina em Finanças e Organizações)
experiences.description: Research assistant in software development and deep learning.

curses.description: It's a specialization in deep learning with 5 courses, which develop a knowledge in 'Neural Networks and Deep Learning', 'Sequence Models', 'Convolutional Neural Networks', 'Structuring Machine Learning Projects' and 'Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter Tuning, Regularization and Optimization'.

curses.place: Fine Tune BERT for Text Classification with TensorFlow (2.5 Hr)
curses.description: It's a guided project using the pre-trained model BERT to fine-tuning for tweets classification using the API keras.

curses.place: Deep Learning with PyTorch : Neural Style Transfer (2 Hr)
curses.description: It's a guided project using the pre-trained model VGG-19 with some layers to transfer the style of an image to another.
